description:

- TINTED LIP MASK: Crafted with the care, our tinted lip mask blends Apple Seed Oil, Shea Butter, and Fruit Extract to seamlessly melt onto your lips, smoothing dry cracks and delivering deep hydration. It can also double as a lip sleeping mask!
- 24 HOURS LASTING & CLINICALLY PROVEN: Experience the enduring comfort of our Applebutter Lip Mask, providing a luxurious hydration shield that keeps your lips moisturized for over 24 hours. (Results based on an independent clinical study)
- SOFTENING: Feel the velvety touch of Applebutter Lip Mask as it softens and evens the texture of your lips! It has nourishing apple seed oil, fruit extract, and a potent 6% shea butter infusion. Recommended for overnight sleeping lip mask!
- MESS-FREE: Our lip mask application is effortlessly smooth and mess-free, thanks to the included spatula. Easy use, great option for gifts!

Embrace the effortless grace of our lip mask application — simply apply a thin layer with the enclosed spatula for a naturally radiant, makeup-free appearance and safeguarding hydration.

reviews.title: A Sweet Remedy for Soft and Supple Lips
reviews.content: I’ve recently added the TOCOBO Lemon Sugar Scrub Lip Mask to my nightly routine, and the results have been delightful. Housed in a charming, honey-like jar, this lip mask exudes a pleasant lemon candy aroma that makes application a treat. The texture is thick and slightly sticky, reminiscent of honey, with fine sugar granules that gently exfoliate without being abrasive. Key ingredients like olive oil and lemon peel oil work together to nourish and rejuvenate the lips, effectively eliminating dryness and flakiness. I prefer using it as an overnight mask, and by morning, my lips feel incredibly soft and hydrated. For those who enjoy a bit of versatility, it can also be used as a quick scrub by massaging it in and rinsing off. Overall, this lip mask has become a must-have in my skincare arsenal, especially during the colder months when my lips need extra care.

Description

Special care using Lip Sleeping Mask!
Vitamin C-rich Berry Mix ComplexTM, containing raspberry, strawberry, cranberry, blueberry extracts erases dry, flaky dead skin on the lips during the night to realize smooth and supple lips the next morning.

1. Berry Mix Complex™
- Berry extracts rich in vitamin C and anti-oxidants act on dry, rough lips, making them smooth and supple.
2. MOISTURE WRAP™
- Hyaluronic acid mineral network forms a moisturizing film to help lock-in active ingredients and the skin to absorb and retain moisture through the night.
3. Sweet and fruity berry fragrance
- Sweet and relaxing fragrance that smells so delicious, it reminds you of real berries.


Suggested Use


1. Before going to bed, apply a liberal amount with the spatula.
※ Effect: Melts stubborn dead skin cells and provides abundant moisture to skin during nighttime.
2. The next morning, gently wipe skin clean with tissue or cotton pad.
※ Effect: Makes the lips smooth and elastic by removing dead skin cells.


Ingredients

Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Hydrogenated C6-14 Olefin Polymers, Polybutene, Microcrystalline Wax, Shea Butter, Synthetic Wax, Candelilla Wax, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Hydrogenated Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Mica, Astrocaryum murumuru Seed Butter, Titanium Dioxide, Dimethicone, Aromatics, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Methicone, Carnauba Wax, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, CI 15985, CI 15850, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Water, Potassium Alginate, Propanediol, Glycerin, Alcohol, Lycium Fruit Extract, Cranberry Fruit Extract, Strawberry Fruit Extract, Raspberry Fruit Extract, Sapindus mukurossi Fruit Extract, Blueberry Fruit Extract,  Rubus chamaemorus Seed Extract, Coffee Extract, Chenopodium quinoa Seed Extract, Magnesium Sulfate, Calcium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Beta-Glucan, Manganese Sulfate, Zinc Sulfate, Ascorbyl GlucosideWhy our Lips ChapComposed of a thin surface epidermiswithout sebaceous glands to produce aprotective oil layer, our lips tend to be morevulnerable to dryness and chapping.Lip Care Prime TimeCompared to the daytime, moisture levels ofour lips drop radically during the night whilewe’re asleep. Lips have a higher level ofmoisture evaporation than our cheeks. What our lips go through a day Soften the flakiness and lock the moisture over the night with our Lip Sleeping Mask.
